testsuite.name: XMLImport
testsuite.system-out:
@i9n Feature: XMLImport As a member of a research group I want to import a xml file So that the system register the corresponding publications
--Output from upload publications without a file-- Scenario: upload publications without a file # XMLImport.feature:13 Given I am at the publications menu # CommonSteps.groovy:8 When I select the "Import XML File" option at the publications menu # CommonSteps.groovy:19 And I select the upload button at the XML import page # XMLImportSteps.groovy:84 Then I'm still on XML import page # XMLImportSteps.groovy:88 And the publications are not stored by the system # XMLImportSteps.groovy:91
testsuite.system-err: --Output from upload publications without a file--
